feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 37 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Clearing. High minus 21.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Monday 20 February 2023
